title: Minimum 2 bots per ARAM game now.... FIX IT!
body: There should be an option to report users who use bots! because obviously the normal tribunal system isn't weeding them out at all. I have at least 2 bots per game in ARAM atm, one where there was 4! Can you at least fix something?! As if the toxic players weren't bad enough...

replies.body: Last few matches and got 4 bots... These bots are annoying let alone helpfull. They literally either feed or stick on my ass until I die or they run away when enemies get too close.
There are no bots in aram... Well none of riots anyways there all other Summoners just wanting to level there account. or working off bans.

I take it back after going over some of my recent aram matches I have realized there were bots in my game or just some noob Summoners. Honestly I think aram is dead, so Riot are just adding bots. Because there is always 1 per team.

P.S. feel free to down vote my comment above I have realized it's wrong and if it gets deleted I don't care as long as I don't get suspended (I'm not deleting it tho)
